description: Kimi K2 is a 1-trillion parameter Mixture-of-Experts model (32B activated) developed by Moonshot AI. It was designed from the ground up for agentic intelligence – strong tool use, autonomous problem-solving, and reasoning. K2-Instruct is the general chat model, instruction-tuned for helpful and coherent responses without long chain-of-thought ('reflex-grade' with no extended thinking by default). It supports a 128K token context and accepts images as input (multimodal). Kimi K2 is open-source (modified MIT license) and optimized for use of external tools like web search and code execution. It's remarkably cost-effective: ~$0.15 per 1M input and $0.60 per 1M output tokens via API. This model achieves near state-of-the-art results on many benchmarks while running efficiently – making open AI more accessible.
